item.title: Gregg Wallace Co-Host John Torode Addresses Racist Language Allegation in ‘MasterChef’ Investigation
item.description: John Torode, the long-serving co-host of BBC’s “MasterChef,” has confirmed he is the subject of a racist language allegation that was upheld in the investigation into the show’

item.title: Gregg Wallace Co-Host John Torode Addresses Racist Language Allegation in ‘MasterChef’ Investigation
item.description: John Torode, the long-serving co-host of BBC’s “MasterChef,” has confirmed he is the subject of a racist language allegation that was upheld in the investigation into the show’
